// for this month bill import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { getAttendance } from "../../actions/attendance_actions" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" function PreviousAttendance() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { if (userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin) { dispatch(getAttendance) } }) return (
Previous Attendance From MM-YYYY to MM-YYYY
{/* boostrap table for all the users , room no , current bill added */}
# Year Month Go to
1 2021 December See
2 2021 November See
3 2021 October
); } export default PreviousAttendance;
